import { createClient } from "npm:@supabase/supabase-js@2";

const supabaseUrl = Deno.env.get("SUPABASE_URL") ?? "";
const serviceRoleKey = Deno.env.get("SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY") ?? "";

if (!supabaseUrl || !serviceRoleKey) {
  console.error("Missing SUPABASE_URL or SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY");
}

const supabase = createClient(supabaseUrl, serviceRoleKey);

Deno.serve(async (req: Request): Promise<Response> => {
  if (req.method !== "GET") {
    return new Response("Method not allowed", { status: 405 });
  }

  const ipHeader = req.headers.get("x-forwarded-for") ?? "";
  const ip = ipHeader.split(",")[0].trim() || null;

  const url = new URL(req.url);
  const playerId = url.searchParams.get("playerId");

  if (!playerId || playerId.length < 3) {
    return new Response("Invalid playerId", { status: 400 });
  }

  // Rate limit sur la lecture aussi, histoire d'éviter le spam
  const { data: allowed, error: rateError } = await supabase.rpc(
    "check_rate_limit",
    {
      p_ip: ip,
      p_player_id: playerId,
    },
  );

  if (rateError) {
    console.error("rate limit error:", rateError);
    return new Response("Rate limiter error", { status: 500 });
  }

  if (allowed === false) {
    return new Response("Too many requests", { status: 429 });
  }

  // Récupérer toutes les relations accepted où ce joueur est impliqué
  const { data, error } = await supabase
    .from("player_relationships")
    .select("user_one_id, user_two_id, status")
    .eq("status", "accepted")
    .or(`user_one_id.eq.${playerId},user_two_id.eq.${playerId}`);

  if (error) {
    console.error("list-friends error:", error);
    return new Response("DB error", { status: 500 });
  }

  const friends: string[] = [];

  for (const rel of data ?? []) {
    if (rel.user_one_id === playerId) {
      friends.push(rel.user_two_id);
    } else if (rel.user_two_id === playerId) {
      friends.push(rel.user_one_id);
    }
  }

  // retire les doublons au cas où
  const uniqueFriends = Array.from(new Set(friends));

  return new Response(JSON.stringify({ playerId, friends: uniqueFriends }), {
    status: 200,
    headers: {
      "Content-Type": "application/json",
      "Access-Control-Allow-Origin": "*",
    },
  });
});
